data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rightmyer, Molly G., Griswold, Terry (2010): Description of a new species of Osmia (Hymenoptera: Megachilidae) from southwestern North America, with a redescription of the enigmatic species Osmia foxi Cameron. Zootaxa 2512: 26-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.294059
